name: Hentai Arena - Adult Patch 18+
detailed_description: This DLC removes clothes from player and enemy characters.
about_the_game: This DLC removes clothes from player and enemy characters.
short_description: This DLC removes clothes from player and enemy characters.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Vietnamese*, Greek*, Danish*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Dutch*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese*, Russian*, Romanian*, Thai*, Turkish*, Hungarian*, Ukrainian*, Finnish*, Czech*, Swedish*, Japanese*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Pentium or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible 1024 VRAM or better
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X
  • Processor: Intel Pentium or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible 1024 VRAM or better
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux+ or SteamOS+
  • Processor: Intel Pentium or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible 1024 VRAM or better
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

content_descriptors.notes:
This DLC has a 3D models of naked/half-naked anime characters.
The game has cartoon blood.
All characters 18+
